name: Huawei | VRP | Network | LBD | Loop Detected (SYSLOG)
Huawei | VRP | Network | LBD | Loop Cleared (SYSLOG)
Huawei | VRP | Network | LBD | Vlan Loop Detected #1 (SYSLOG)
description: LDT/4/Porttrap: OID 1.3.6.1.4.1.2011.5.25.174.3.3Loopback does exist on interface(12)Ethernet0/0/8 ( VLAN 3064 ) , loopback detect status: 3.(1:normal; 2:block; 3:shutdown; 4:trap; 5:nolearn)

patterns.value_re: Loopback does exist on interface\(\d+\)(?P<interface>\S+) \(\s*VLAN (?P<vlan>\d+)\s*\)\s*, loopback detect status: (2|3|4|5)\.\s*\(1:normal; 2:block; 3:shutdown; 4:trap; 5:nolearn\)

name: Huawei | VRP | Network | LBD | Vlan Loop Cleared #1 (SYSLOG)
description: LDT/4/Porttrap: OID 1.3.6.1.4.1.2011.5.25.174.3.3Loopback does exist on interface(12)Ethernet0/0/8 ( VLAN 3064 ) , loopback detect status: 1.(1:normal; 2:block; 3:shutdown; 4:trap; 5:nolearn)

patterns.value_re: Loopback does exist on interface\(\d+\)(?P<interface>\S+) \(\s*VLAN (?P<vlan>\d+)\s*\)\s*, loopback detect status: 1\.\s*\(1:normal; 2:block; 3:shutdown; 4:trap; 5:nolearn\)
